transArray.content: The front desk service is good, check-in is fast, the room is hygienic and clean, the transportation location is convenient, the bedding is comfortable and soft, the pillows are very comfortable, the washing and care is very good, the shower room facilities are advanced and easy to use, the floor is clean and bright, the Internet is fast, and the TV can be cast . The windows are high-tech and fully automatic. It is a great experience and is the first choice for business trips.
